metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2043 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the goToFinish1NF function injs/normalization.js in phpMyAdmin 4.4.x before 4.4.15.3 and 4.5.x before4.5.4 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a table name to the normalization page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4-1').
